scripts.confirm: read -p 'Are you sure you want to deploy to PRODUCTION? (y/N) ' ans && [ "$ans" = y ]
scripts.build-local: npm run test && vite build --mode development
scripts.build-staging: npm run test && vite build --mode staging
scripts.build-production: npm run test && vite build --mode production
scripts.deploy-staging: npm run backup-staging                    && npm run build-staging    && scp -r dist/* mattia@192.168.1.99:/shared_fs/data/gates-ui
scripts.deploy-production: npm run confirm && npm run backup-prod && npm run build-production && scp -r dist/* mattia@192.168.1.100:/shared_fs/data/gates-ui
